title: Complex analysis of symmetric operators, I
abstract:
This is an upgraded version of von Neumann's famous theory on self-adjoint
extensions of symmetric operators. As implied in the title, we have
incorporated complex analysis (and complex geometry) into this theory in an
essential way. The roles played by Hermtian symmetric spaces and modern value
distribution theory in the theory are clarified. In doing so, many new concepts
are introduced and many new results are obtained.
